metadata.title: Expanded Multiverse
metadata.author: Nauter and Willow
metadata.description:
An addon that focuses on expanding the idea of Renegades.
These additions include:
More tutorial-esque ships that provide simple gameplay for some of the new features introduced by Vanilla Multiverse.
New sectors that serve as pseudo-resting points for travellers to patch themselves up and stock up on supplies and/or accept quests
Extra fanon lore that is well within MV's territory, not too outlandish but not too dull.
